content: the half moon goddess is a crescent-shaped shell-stitch shawlette it was designed for and works up beautifully in gradient yarn but is also stunning in solid or stripes the crescent shape makes it very easy to wear \*\*materials \*\* approximately 1100 yards of 0-1 fingering/sock weight size c 2 75 mm hook shown in \ sheepjes whirl\ https //tinyurl com/bettyswhirl 775 blueberry bambam and 557 coral catastrophe 60% cotton 40% acryllic 225g/1000m/1100y shown in \ nurturing fibres\ http //www tinyurl com/bettysgoodloops \ eco lush\ https //www goodloopsyarn com/collections/nurturing-fibres/products/eco-lush-yarn aff=6 40% bamboo viscose 60% cotton 7 balls 50g/200m/219y color a = 1 charcoal color b = 1 cobblestone color c = 2 anvil color d = 3 mist also show in 7 balls of baltic \*\*gauge\*\* 5 st and 3 5 row per inch in vst \*\*skill level \*\* easy \*\*finished measurements \*\* 71 w by 14 l \*\*a free version of this pattern is available on my website with advertisements \*\* crochet pattern only - digital file this pattern is for a crescent-shaped shell shawlette it was designed for and works up beautifully in gradient yarn 1 but is also stunning in solid or stripes 2 join my facebook community bettys besties 3 for help with this pattern and to show off your finished creations be sure to tag @bettymcknit in your social media postsvideo tutorials available on my youtube channel tested by melanie metz tracy quirt shona tomlinson akshata upadhyaya 1 https //www tinyurl com/bettyswhirl 2 https //www tinyurl com/bettysgoodloops 3 https //www facebook com/groups/bettysbesties
